oracle text:
8/8
When Cthulu, the Dreaming Horror enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature, discards a card, and loses 3 life. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a creature card was put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Cthulu, the Dreaming Horror. At the beginning of each end step, if Cthulu, the Dreaming Horror has five or more +1/+1 counters on it, you win the game.
